channel.title: EpiCraft! PvP, Survival, Spells, Skyblock, Hunger Games and More!
channel.description:
Epicraft is a new 24/7 dedicated server with a multitude of plugins including towny for land protection, spells for PvP, PvP arenas and games, Skyblock, Hunger Games, and VIP packages! We have friendly staff and respect is in our rules. Visit us today! play.epicraft.info
http://www.planetminecraft.com/server/epicraft-pvp-survival-spells-and-more/
